product.name: Dasawaga Kasaya
product.bestFor: An ideal remedy for Flu, Viral Fever, Cough, Phlegm,Wet Nose,Runny Nose, Sneezing, Headaches and Body Pain.
product.suggestedUse: Boil the contents with 8 cups of water, strain to 1 cup, drink half cup twice a day after the meal.
